verses.verse: (The Joy of Living in Zion) Of the Korahites. A Psalm. A Song. On the holy mount stands the city he founded;
(Ps 78.67) the LORD loves the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.
(Isa 60.1) Glorious things are spoken of you, O city of God. Selah
Among those who know me I mention Rahab and Babylon; Philistia, too, and Tyre, with Cush— “This one was born there,” they say.
(Ps 48.8) And of Zion it shall be said, “This one and that one were born in it,” for the Most High himself will establish it.
(Ezek 13.9) The LORD records, as he registers the peoples, “This one was born there.” Selah
(Ps 36.9) Singers and dancers alike say, “All my springs are in you.”
